  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>NCTE_Scoilnet</catalog>
            <entry>4692</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Basic Ideas on the Periodic Table</string>
            <string language="es">Nociones básicas sobre la tabla periódica</string>
            <string language="ga">Smaointe Bunúsacha faoin Tábla Peiriadach</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Grundideen auf der periodischen Tabelle</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Idées fondamentales sur le Tableau périodique</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Idéias básicas na tabela periódica</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Idee di base sulla Tabella periodica</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Βασικές ιδέες σχετικά με τον περιοδικό πίνακα</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Overview of how the periodic table was developed and information on its breakdown into different blocks.</string>
            <string language="es">Visión general sobre cómo se desarrolló la tabla periódica e información sobre su desglose en diferentes bloques.</string>
            <string language="ga">Forbhreathnú ar an gcaoi ar forbraíodh an tábla peiriadach agus eolas faoina bhriseadh síos i mbloic dhifriúla.</string>
          </description>
          <language>en</language>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Chemistry</string>
            <string language="es">Química. Notas</string>
            <string language="ga">Ceimic</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Notes</string>
            <string language="ga">Nótaí</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Überblick über, wie die periodische Tabelle und 
Informationen über seinen Zusammenbruch in unterschiedliche Blöcke 
entwickelt wurde.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Vue d'ensemble de la façon dont la table 
périodique a été développée et l'information sur sa ventilation 
en différents blocs.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Vista geral de como a tabela periódica foi 
desenvolvida e informação em sua avaria em blocos diferentes.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Descrizione di come la tabella periodica è stata 
sviluppata e le informazioni sulla relativa ripartizione in blocchi 
differenti.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Επισκόπηση για το πώς ο περιοδικός πίνακας 
αναπτύχθηκε και πληροφορίες για τη διακοπή του στις διαφορετικές 
ομάδες δεδομένων.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Chemie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Anmerkungen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Chimie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Notes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Chemistry</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Chimica</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Note</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Σημειώσεις</string>
          </keyword>
